people.title: Country Star Ty Herndon: 'I'm an Out, Proud and Happy Gay Man'
people.topComment:
I'm shocked! I can't believe this! My head is spinning
No way... That guy is NOT 51!!!!

people.title: Watch Diem Brown's Heartbreaking Memorial Video
people.topComment: Im sobbing...she was full of life and I am sitting here thinking of how I am not living it to the fullest like she did. I must change that. Godspeed Diem.
